TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ForBlockSyntax extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.ForOrForEachBlockSyntax
Public NotInheritable Class ForBlockSyntax Inherits ForOrForEachBlockSyntax

Docs.summary: Represents a For block, including the introducing statement, the body and the "Next" (which can be omitted if a containing For has a Next with multiple variables).

.property instance class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.ForStatementSyntax ForStatement
Public ReadOnly Property ForStatement As ForStatementSyntax

Docs.summary: The For statement that begins the block.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.NextStatementSyntax NextStatement { get; }
.property instance class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.NextStatementSyntax NextStatement
Public ReadOnly Property NextStatement As NextStatementSyntax

Docs.summary: The Next statement that ends the block. If two For or For Each statements are ended by a single Next statement, the inner For will not have a Next statement.
Docs.remarks: This child is optional. If it is not present, then Nothing is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxList<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.StatementSyntax> Statements { get; }
.property instance valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxList`1<class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.StatementSyntax> Statements
Public ReadOnly Property Statements As SyntaxList(Of StatementSyntax)

Docs.summary: The statements contained in the For or For Each loop. This might be an empty list.
Docs.remarks: If nothing is present, an empty list is returned.
